original_text: And when the Philistines heard the noise of the shout, they said, What meaneth the noise of this great shout in the camp of the Hebrews? And they understood that the ark of the Lord was come into the camp.
korean_text: 블레셋 사람이 그 외치는 소리를 듣고 이르되 히브리 진영에서 큰 소리로 외침은 어찌 됨이냐 하다가 여호와의 궤가 진영에 들어온 줄을 깨달은지라

sentences.original_text: And when the Philistines heard the noise of the shout
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 블레셋 사람들이 외침 소리를 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: What meaneth the noise of this great shout
sentences.korean_translation: 이 큰 외침 소리가 무엇을 의미합니까

sentences.original_text: in the camp of the Hebrews?
that the ark of the Lord was come into the camp
